ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Thanks to Open Access Funding (OA-fond) (oa-fond@hvl.no) at Western Norway University of Applied Sciences, Norway. Authors also gratefully acknowledge the financial support provided by the Indo-Norwegian Collaborative Project (INCP 2015–2020) and mobility research funding from the UTFORSK program, Western Norway University of Applied Sciences, Bergen, Norway.
